text: Banchory (Scottish Gaelic: Beannchar, 'blessed place') is a burgh or town in Aberdeenshire, Scotland, lying approximately 18 miles west of Aberdeen, near where the Feugh River meets the River Dee. == Other websites == * Banchory Air Training Corps * Rotary Club of Banchory-Ternan * Visit Banchory - Gateway to Royal Deeside * Banchory Community Website * Official Burnett Worldwide Website * Banchory Ternan East Parish Church == References == Category:Towns in Aberdeenshire
title: Banchory
